answers.answer: This is a hepatitis C forum. Autoimmune hepatitis is a very different disease with different treatments.  It might be better to discuss this with your treating doctor. Wishing you the best.
Here is a link to the correct forum on Medhep.http://www.medhelp.org/forums/Autoimmune-Disorders-/show/174Best to you

question: Are there any vitamins and supplement that can help the liver get stronger? I have autoimmune hepatitis and diabetes , can take supplement
title: Autoimmune Hepatitis
